fi.jumi.api.drivers

Interface SuiteNotifier


  • public interface SuiteNotifier

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fireInternalError(String message, Throwable cause)
      Notifies about an internal error in the testing framework, i.e.
      void fireTestFound(TestId testId, String name)
      Notifies about the existence of a test.

    • Method Detail

      • fireTestFound

        void fireTestFound(TestId testId,
                 String name)
        Notifies about the existence of a test.

        Must be called before starting the test.[1] Must be called with parent testId before any of its children.[2] Idempotent,[3] but the name must always be the same if called multiple times.[4]

        References:
        [1]: onTestFound_must_be_called_before_onTestStarted,
        [2]: parents_must_be_found_before_their_children,
        [3]: removes_duplicate_onTestFound_events,
        [4]: tests_must_be_found_always_with_the_same_name

      • fireTestStarted

        TestNotifier fireTestStarted(TestId testId)
        Notifies about the beginning of a test execution.

        May be called multiple times, before a test is finished, to produce nested tests.[1] The only limitation is that a nested test must be finished before the surrounding tests.[2]

        Everything printed to System.out[3] and System.err[4] after the call to this method[5] will be recorded from the current thread[6] and threads which are started by it[7] (possibly together with timestamps and name of the thread which printed it).

        Returns:
        a notifier for the events of the test execution that was just started.
        See Also:
        TestNotifier.fireTestFinished()
        References:
        [1]: notifies_about_the_beginning_and_end_of_a_run,
        [2]: fireTestFinished_must_be_called_on_the_current_test,
        [3]: captures_stdout & replaces_stdout_with_the_captured_stream,
        [4]: captures_stderr & replaces_stderr_with_the_captured_stream,
        [5]: captures_what_is_printed_during_a_run,
        [6]: concurrent_captures_are_isolated_from_each_other,
        [7]: captures_what_is_printed_in_spawned_threads

      • fireInternalError

        void fireInternalError(String message,
                     Throwable cause)
        Notifies about an internal error in the testing framework, i.e. not a test failure.
